metadata.title: CVE-2024-43884 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Bluetooth: MGMT: Add error handling to pair_device()hci_conn_params_add() never checks for a NULL value and could lead to aNULLpointer dereference causing a crash.Fixed by adding error handling in the function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-43884` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.11.0-12-generic - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.11.0-12-generic-lpae - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-extra-3.11.0-12-generic - 3.11.0-12.19
No subscription required
